Melee Weapon Attack:
 +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 
Hit:
 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

description:
Medium beast, unaligned
Smaller than giant sharks and hunter sharks, reef sharks inhabit shallow waters and coral reefs, gathering in small packs to hunt. A full-grown
specimen measures 6 to 10 feet long.

The shark has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the shark's allies is within 5 feet
of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
The shark can breathe only underwater.

name: Reef Shark
